description: This file defines a Qwik component for a flower generation page, including styles, state management, and rendering logic.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component that renders flower generation UI with state management and effects.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up side effects that run when the component becomes visible, such as timers.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Creates reactive state for the component, including 'count' and 'number'.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Applies scoped styles defined in 'flower.css' to the component.

methods.name: useLocation
methods.description: Accesses URL location information, particularly query parameters.
